creator: Dr Zio - Yoga Teacher
descriptionHtml:
Are you Allergic to anything?
Do you have skin allergies?
Are you tired of temporary relief by medicines?
Need permanent solution from allergy?
Guess what? We have solution for this.
Dr.Zio has discovered a scientific research-based formula for allergy relief. It was created after complete research and development. The guidance from allergist and physicians was taken into consideration to make allergy relief formula.

The app provides with a perfect covering for allergies:
• Yoga for stamina
It is a great option to improve your stamina & overall energy levels.
• Yoga for skin allergy
A great option to manage skin allergy or eczema is yoga as it helps to lower inflammation and stress.
• Morning warm up
It helps to improve decision making and boost your mood & energy for a morning warm up.
• Bedtime yoga
Yoga helps to be relaxed and stress-free that leads to better sleep.
• Yoga for cold and cough
It helps to protect sinus, strengthens your entire body and improve blood flow therefore relive you from congestion and cough symptoms.
• Yoga for stretching
Stretching helps to increase flexibility and doesn’t let you feel tired.
• Hybrid Yoga for balance, Strength, Flexibility & better posture
A practice of yoga merged with another activity is Hybrid yoga.
• Yoga to boost immunity & memory
It helps to cut down inflammation as it helps to reduce stress in the body, leading to boost immunity. It involves visualization and chanting that helps to improve memory.
• Yoga to detox
It helps you detox your body by yoga and breathing exercise
• Yoga for food allergy
Yoga helps with food allergies as it improves your immune system.
• Yoga for spiritual enlighten & Inner exploration
It is a smooth process that keeps you open-minded towards the dimension of life.
Features for allergies:
- Demonstrating every step of exercise in 3D videos with voice guidance for beginners
- Easy to understand home-based yoga, workouts & exercise designed for everyone: men, women / ladies & girls.
- Personal trainer to keep track & coach
- Supports 18 languages - Voice instructions
- Track weight loss plan progress and burned calories
- All home workout, no need of any instruments
- 3 difficulty levels for beginner, intermediate and pro.
- Breathing tips and advice on video
- Addition in-detail videos to understand Yoga poses, Pranayama & Exercises better way
- Daily healthy tips and guides on how yoga can keep you away from allergies
- More customize plans for each user
- Daily workout and diet tracker
- Customized workout reminders to remind you progress of your health
- Chart of daily burned calories, weight loss & BMI
- Offer research & science-based yoga & exercise training
- No gym & no equipment
- Work 100% - (any age)
- NonVeg / Veg / Vegan diet for all kind of users

Secret Formula for allergies:
1. Ancient Yoga
Yoga helps to mitigate allergies and it helps the body to lower the anxiety level. Vrikshasana, Salamba Sarvangasana, Halasana are few of the certified and reputable poses which are practiced to help the body to fight allergies.
2. Vedic diet
To mitigate your allergy symptoms a nutritionally healthy diet is always recommended. If you follow a healthy diet, it can help your body to avoid any kind of allergies.
3. Pranayama
Pranayama can help you cure allergies on a permanent basis.
4. HIIT exercises or workout
HIIT exercises helps to improves breathing and reduces sinus pressure.

Easy, helpful and 100% FREE! What are you waiting for? This is the best yoga app in 2021 to keep yourself allergy free.
Wishing you Happy allergy free Journey with us… Enjoy…
Find out even more at http://www.drzio.com.
